com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.javascript.host.canvas.rendering

Interface RenderingBackend

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AwtRenderingBackend, GaeRenderingBackend

    public interface RenderingBackend
    Interface to the rendering context used by CanvasRenderingContext2D. We have this abstraction to support GAE also.
    Author:
    Ronald Brill

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • drawImage

        void drawImage(ImageReader imageReader,
               int dxI,
               int dyI)
        throws IOException
        Draws images onto the context.
        Parameters:
        imageReader - the reader to read the image from 8the first one)
        dxI - the x coordinate of the starting point (top left)
        dyI - the y coordinate of the starting point (top left)
        Throws:
        IOException - in case o problems

      • getBytes

        byte[] getBytes(int width,
                int height,
                int sx,
                int sy)
        Creates a byte array containing the (4) color values of all pixels.
        Parameters:
        width - the width
        height - the height
        sx - start point x
        sy - start point y
        Returns:
        the bytes

      • encodeToString

        String encodeToString(String type)
               throws IOException
        Constructs a base64 encoded string out of the image data.
        Parameters:
        type - the name of the image format
        Returns:
        the base64 encoded string
        Throws:
        IOException - in case o problems
